description:
Crystals are a nice way of outfitting your dungeons and caves with simple and cheap RPG terrain pieces.

Here I show you how to easily make crystals for your Dungeons & Dragons, Pathfinder or other tabletop games. I used XPS foam, PVA glue, acrylic paints and some coins (washers work fine too).

Music: https://www.bensound.com
title: Cheap Crystal Terrain for D&D / Wargaming | Terrain Tutorial
